                                                            java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                            javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                                            javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        Encoding with Base64 and Aes128Ecb.
        Parameters:
        source - string to encode
        Returns:
        encoded string
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if no algorithm
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - if no padding exist
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if invalid key used
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - if wrong block size
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - if padding violate rule
